title: Frank film (TEFC)
brief_description: Award winning animated autobiography. With two voices reciting autobiographical details over sequences created from images cut from magazines Mouris creates a portrait of his life and the life of America. Collage and the animation of still images are the main visual techniques used in this comment upon materialism. Suitable for upper secondary level.
